value.title: The Register calls for aid, and Microsoft's Rohan Kumar will answer... our questions about SQL Edge and Azure Synapse
value.excerpt: Build There was SQL Edge and Azure Synapse news at Microsoft's reimagined Build gathering this week, so The Register had a chat with corporate vice president Rohan Kumar about the company's database ambitions.

images.title: The Register calls for aid, and Microsoft's Rohan Kumar will answer... our questions about SQL Edge and Azure Synapse

value.title: Microsoft, in collaboration with OpenAI, unveils AI supercomputer
value.excerpt: During its Build 2020 developer conference on Tuesday, Microsoft unveiled the new supercomputer built in collaboration with OpenAI, an artificial intelligence startup found by Elon Musk. Microsoft announced that the supercomputer hosted in Azure was developed exclusively to train OpenAI’s large-scale artificial intelligence models.

images.title: Microsoft, in collaboration with OpenAI, unveils AI supercomputer

value.title: Microsoft Azure: Boosting machine learning and virtual desktops with GPUs
value.excerpt: Nvidia graphics processors are now part of Microsoft's hybrid cloud platform, in your data centre and on the edge of your network.

value.title: Microsoft's Powerful Supercomputer Will Supercharge AI for Azure Developers

value.title: Microsoft helps Sony power the world’s first AI image sensor with Azure

value.title: What’s the role of Microsoft Azure in the IoT sphere?
value.excerpt: An article by Kevin E. Kline, Principal Program Manager at SentryOne. Microsoft Azure is a cloud-based IaaS (infrastructure as a service) that has technically been around since 2008, and provides nearly two dozen categories of specific services.

value.title: Microsoft will integrate its Azure AI system into Sony's smart camera sensors
value.excerpt: Microsoft and Sony have formed a new partnership to apply the former's Azure AI capabilities to the latter's smart camera sensor system. The goal is to boost computer vision for enterprise settings.

images.title: Microsoft will integrate its Azure AI system into Sony's smart camera sensors

value.title: Microsoft and Sony to create smart camera solutions for AI-enabled image sensor
value.excerpt: Sony and Microsoft have joined together to create artificial intelligence-powered (AI) smart camera solutions to make it easier for enterprise customers to perform video analytics, the companies announced.
